GlobalEventHandlers.ondurationchange

The ondurationchange property sets and returns the event handler for the durationchange event.

Syntax

element.ondurationchange = handlerFunction;
var handlerFunction = element.ondurationchange;

handlerFunction should be either null or a JavaScript function specifying the handler for the event.

Notes

See the DOM event handlers page for information on working with on... handlers.

The durationchange event is fired when the duration attribute has been updated.

See the durationchange event documentation for more information about the event.

Specification

Specification Status Comment
HTML Living Standard
The definition of 'ondurationchange' in that specification.		 Living Standard
